summary: This document is a billing statement from AT&T Wireless for Martin Golick, detailing monthly charges, payments, and account adjustments. It includes information on service usage, taxes, and fees associated with the account, as well as instructions for payment and account management. This document contains detailed records of voice usage for an AT&T Wireless account belonging to Martin Golick. It includes call logs with timestamps, durations, and locations, primarily focused on calls made to and from Palm Beach, Florida. The document is significant as it provides insight into the communication patterns associated with the Epstein case. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and call activity associated with the account of Martin Golick, including numerous incoming and outgoing calls primarily from Palm Beach, Florida. The records indicate various call durations and types, including night and weekend rates, as well as message retrieval activities. This document details the voice usage and text/multimedia message activity associated with the account of Martin Golick for the period around July 2004. It includes timestamps, call durations, and locations for various incoming and outgoing communications, primarily in Florida.
